title: Water Leak from Ceiling
description: Persistent drip from the bathroom ceiling. Looks like a leak from the unit above. Requires immediate inspection.

title: Frequent Elevator Malfunction
description: Elevator 3 is constantly out of service, causing long waiting times. This has been an issue for weeks.

title: Cracked Tile in Living Room
description: One tile near the balcony has cracked, likely due to shifting. Poses a minor safety hazard.

title: Cockroach Sighting in Kitchen
description: Noticed several cockroaches in the kitchen area. Requires pest control treatment for the unit.

title: Hallway Lights Not Working
description: The light bulbs in the hallway on the 25th floor near unit 25C have been flickering and are now completely out.

title: Clogged Toilet
description: The toilet in the main bathroom is clogged and will not flush properly.

title: Slow Internet Connectivity
description: Internet speeds in the unit have been consistently slow and unreliable over the past two days, affecting work from home.
